title: R Console Usage
text: section describes extract information dropout demo dataset without using dropR shiny UI. First, let’s make sure dema dataset loaded available. dataset look like Now, let’s extract dropout, .e., information participant dropped questionnaire never returned. demo dataset questions easily identified prefix vi_ experimnetal_condition column indicates belonging group treated differently. example, one group received different sequence questions.
code: library(dropR) data("dropRdemo") qs <- which(grepl("vi_", names(dropRdemo))) # add numeric drop out position to original dataset dropRdemo$do_idx <- extract_drop_out_from_df(dropRdemo,q_pos = qs)
